page.title: 16SCOUTS-1st Bolney,Twineham
page.content: Before{scouts}you are in the{cubs from{7}to{10yrs. { Scouts}are a group of boys aged from {10}to{16.}When we are{16}we go onto {venture scouts.}Instead of{Akela,}like the{cubs,}we have a{leader}called {Skip.}The{leader}is usually a man. We have{2 patrols}with{leaders.}They usually have{six scouts}in each{patrol and the{leader's}are well{experienced and are aged around{14. { We learn about tracks and tracking; {making plaster casts; first aid and {map reading. For tracking two scouts go out and lay tracking signs and the rest of us have to track them down. We also do{rifle shooting}and go on {camps. For map reading Skip gives us a location and we have to go and find out what's there.
